name:
Transcoremation
(Complete Hard Copy)
description:
With Joshua Lipsey's Core Concepts™ method, you will learn to work your core through functional, dynamic, and holds that engage not only your abdominal muscles but your glutes, back and obliques making sure every muscle is working giving you a strong and balanced core. You will transform your body creating a strong lean physique by working your core in conjunction with other parts of your body therefore giving you a full body workout.

Here's what you get, 13 Workouts on 4 DVDs:           

360  Butt  (Approx. 30mins)
360 Abs (Approx. 30mins)
360 Back (Approx. 30mins)
360 Obique (Approx. 30mins)
Core & Arms (Approx. 30mins)
Core & Legs (Approx. 30mins)
Core Countdown (Approx. 30mins)
Core IT (Approx. 30mins)
Core Tempo (Approx. 30mins)
Coredio (Approx. 30mins)
Core Plank (Approx. 20mins)
Core Freeze (Approx. 30mins)
Core Foam Flex (Approx. 15mins)

name:
Core Countdown,
Core & Arms,
Core & Legs
(Download Only)
description:
Core countdown is the first video of the body transcormation kit.It is a 30 minute video geared to target your four major core muscles through a series of transitions called "core concepts".For the next 30 minutes keep your eyes on Joshua and the clock 3..2..1 

Here's what you get, 3 videos: 

Core & Arms (Approx. 30mins) 
Core & Legs (Approx. 30mins) 
Core Countdown (Approx. 30mins)
